pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video begins with an aerial view of a village, showing several houses with white and red roofs, surrounded by green fields and patches of trees. As the camera moves forward, more houses and buildings come into view, including some with distinct tower-like structures. The camera continues to ascend, revealing a larger area of the village with more houses and the surrounding landscape, which includes rolling hills and fields. The video concludes with a wide view of the village and the expansive green fields, with mountains visible in the background.
